name: FileExporter
short_description:
Export Attachments, Content, or Documents quickly and easily with FileExporter! 

FileExporter is a free utility that enables a Salesforce administrator to export files (Attachments, Content or Documents) in their original formats any time, on demand.

FileExporter also provides CSV summary files that contain IDs, filenames, and file types. For Attachments, one summary file also lists the record ID each Attachment is associated with. 

Compared to the Salesforce.com Data Export service, this utility provides a more immediate solution that can be run any time, and more easily usable results.
summary: Export Salesforce Attachments, Content, or Documents quickly & easily
